mapper.insert: insert into artbay_member(mid, injung, irum, birth, phone, email, gender, age, pwd, zip, address, address2, mdate, m_status) values(#{mid}, #{injung}, #{irum}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{memberJoinEmail}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{pwd}, #{zip}, #{address}, #{address2}, now(), #{m_status})
mapper.select: select mid from artbay_member where mid like #{_parameter}
select mid, pwd from artbay_member where mid = #{mid}
select count(lot) totSize from artwork where mid like '%${_parameter}%' or artwork_name like '%${_parameter}%'
mapper.insert: insert into artwork(mid, artwork_name, artwork_ctgr, artist, material, artwork_size, start_price, current_price, regist_date, due_date, direct_price, hit, bid_cnt, crnt_status) values(#{mid}, #{artwork_name}, #{artwork_ctgr}, #{artist}, #{material}, #{artwork_size}, #{start_price}, 0, now(), (SELECT DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)), #{direct_price}, 0, 0, #{crnt_status} )
insert into artimg(lot, imgFile, thumbnail) values (#{lot}, #{imgFile}, #{thumbnail})
insert into notice(title, doc, not_date) values(#{title}, #{doc}, #{not_date}) ;
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(serial) FROM notice WHERE title LIKE '%${_parameter}%'
SELECT serial, title, doc, hit, date_format(not_date, "%y-%m-%d") not_date FROM notice WHERE title LIKE '%${findStr}%' ORDER BY serial DESC LIMIT ${startNo-1}, ${listSize}
mapper.update: update notice set hit = hit+1 where serial = #{_parameter}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(QNA_NUM) FROM QNA WHERE QNA_TITLE LIKE '%${_parameter}%'

SELECT QNA_NUM, MID, QNA_DOC, GRP, SEQ, DEEP, MID, QNA_PWD, QNA_TYPE, QNA_TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(QNA_DATE, "%y-%m-%d") QNA_DATE, CONCAT(LPAD(" ", DEEP*6, " "), QNA_TITLE) QNA_TITLE FROM QNA q WHERE QNA_TITLE LIKE '%${findStr}%' ORDER BY GRP DESC, SEQ ASC LIMIT ${startNo-1}, ${listSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA(QNA_NUM, GRP, SEQ, DEEP, MID, QNA_PWD, QNA_TITLE, QNA_DOC, QNA_DATE, QNA_STATUS, QNA_TYPE) VALUES(getQnaSerial('i'), getQnaSerial(''), 0, 0, #{mid}, #{qna_pwd}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_doc}, now(), #{qna_status}, #{qna_type})
